ygData.subject: RE: Mistmoore Castle
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Your monk didn t pull about 10 things.  He pulled one thing, which, instead of chasing straight after him, took a convoluted path through the castle
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 28 Jan 2000 John_Senior@... wrote:
>
> Last night me (35 bard), 50 monk, 40 Mage, 35 Druid and 35 Paladin made our
> way to the music room by having the monk pull, he could pull things solo,
> we eventually held the music/piano room, that was until the monk pulled
> about 10 things.

Your monk didn't pull about 10 things. He pulled one thing,
which, instead of chasing straight after him, took a
convoluted path through the castle triggering other mobs.

> I had to go after this and never got the chance to get a lute, although I
> got the black silk gloves (in case you don't know, I am getting a friend
> full Lambent in return for a Yak). All I need to know is was I in the right
> place to get the lute, who drops it and is it a rare drop?

If there were gypsy musicians, gypsy dancers, and/or
werewolves, then yes you were in the right place. The gypsy
lute seems to be semi-rare. I'd estimate about 1 in 10-15
gypsy musicians has one.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
